targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory/memory-used" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM /^cpu-.*\/cpu-idle/ WHERE "plugin_instance" = '$cpu' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "plugin_instance" WHERE plugin = 'cpu' AND host =~ /$host/

list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "plugin_instance" WHERE plugin = 'interface' AND host =~ /$host/

list.name: df
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "plugin_instance" WHERE plugin = 'df' AND host =~ /$host/
